events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and want to request a refund immediately since this was not what I paid for.
The system has categorized this case under refund after detecting keywords like refund and wrong product.
Your case has been assigned to a customer service representative who will assist you with your refund claim.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund for the incorrect product.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached a photo showing the completely different item I got instead of the one I ordered.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for resolving this quickly. I appreciate the prepaid return label and refund offer. Looking forward to getting this sorted.
Your refund request has been processed successfully, and the return shipping label has been emailed to you.
We are checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and the return process went smoothly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As everything seems resolved, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for choosing our service.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey regarding your recent support experience. Your feedback helps us improve.
